Posts.Content: Thanks to you all for your very kind replies and advice.  I had my last drain out today, everything is so very tight and I feel like Im all trussed up!  Think I'm definitely going to contact bcn tomorrow as pain is really making me ill and the sick feeling all the time is horrible. Good luck and best wishes to you all and really big thanks, such a comfort to know you can turn to others who know how you feel. XXXX :)
Posts.Title: Sickness and pain, advice needed.

Posts.Content: Hello everyone, I could really do with some help. Had a mastectomy on Thursday. I was given codeine phosphate, paracetamol and ibuprofen for pain relief but codeine made me sick so advised to cut this out.  However I am constantly feeling sick from when I wake to bedtime and am in considerable pain as the painkillers aren't touching the pain I have. Just wondered if anyone had any suggestions to help as this would be greatly appreciated. Many thanks
Posts.Title: Sickness and pain, advice needed.

Posts.Content: Not started hormone therapy yet, told to start Tamoifen day after rads finish so got that to look forward to, lol!! Getting bad head and neck aches and pains across shoulder blades. Any advice on Tamoifen would be gratefully received, am I likely to suffer any side effects starting on it? Xx
Posts.Title: Achy joints during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I'm in the middle of having radiotherapy, on my 8th day and suddenly feeling really really achy, my joints ache so much , is this normal for rads to the chest area? Also told I have condo chonditis so grateful for any tips   Good luck to everyone   Many thanks Amanda x
Posts.Title: Achy joints during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi thank you for your reply. Aching has come on in the last few days, feels like flu aching. Costochondritis started prior to rads, they said rads will aggravate, I just wasn't sure if aching all over was a side effect of rads to chest area. Everything feels an effort and brushing my teeth even whacks me out!! Is it likely to get worse? Many thanks
Posts.Title: Achy joints during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Della Lovely to meet you and thank you for the support, feel like I just can't burden my family with all of this as I don't want to upset them anymore they are already.  My brother got diagnosed with cancer straight after Christmas and now me so it's been full on. Is it likely they will do more tests to see if there is cancer elsewhere Della? Its so nice to be able to talk to someone :)
Posts.Title: Feeling Lost

Posts.Content: Thanks so much to you both for the support, it's great to be able to chat to someone who understands Feeling bit more positive already.  :)
Posts.Title: Feeling Lost

Posts.Content: Hello everyone This is my first attempt at posting as I'm new to all of this but I desparately need help. Saw consultant yesterday to discuss results of my sentinel node biopsy.  Had five nodes removed two of which are micrometastase, having a mastectomy then radiotherapy.  What I need to know is will I now undergo other tests to check if I have cancer anywhere else? as this hasn't yet been mentioned.  I just now thinking every twinge I get is cancer.  Really need psychological help as not coping at all at the moment, feeling bombarded with various dates for appointments, my poor family are going through hell with my up and down moods and I just don't know what to do or who to turn to. Please help x
Posts.Title: Feeling Lost
